extension.name: Social Login
extension.author: xbgmsharp
extension.description: Janrain Social Login for Joomla2.5. Base on http://sociallogin.sourceforge.net

field.name: usecurl
field.label: Use curl library
field.description: The best option is to use the php curl library. If for some reason you can not install this on your web server, then you need to switch this off. In this case you need to switch on the php parameter allow_url_fopen, which is not adviceable due to possible security issues.

field.name: language
field.label: Override Language
field.description: Force a value on user connection. Must be valid Joolma Language format, eg: en-GB

field.name: timezone
field.label: Override TimeZone
field.description: Force a value on user connection. Must be a valid Joomla Timezone, eg:Europe/Madrid
